1.「刻印を刻まれし者よ……。: You who are engraved with the mark...

2.「我が主に 捧げられし者よ。| 貴様の命……もらい受けに来た！: You who are marked by my Lord. We have come...|...to take your life!

3.ブラッドメイジたちとの戦いに|勝利した <cs_pchero>は|元の宝箱の前に: Having won the battle against the Blood Mages,|<cs_pchero> returned to the original|treasure chest.

4.しかし 突然 めまいに おそわれ|意識が 遠くなっていく……。: However, they were suddenly struck by|dizziness and lost consciousness...

5.「我の定めし 供物よ…… | 我がもとへ 来るがよい……。: Come, my chosen offering...|Come to me...

7.<cs_pchero>は 気を取り直して|アクターのカギを使って 宝箱を開けた。: <cs_pchero> pulled themselves together|and used the Actor's Key to open the treasure|chest.

8.宝箱の中には|極意書の最終巻が 入っていた。: Inside the treasure chest contained the|Inner Arts Final Volume.

9.<cs_pchero>は|極意書の最終巻（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me: <cs_pchero> received|the Inner Arts Final Volume (Key Item)!<me 60>

11.「今 キミの存在が こっちに近づいてるおかげで| こうして 出てくることができた: Now that you're here, your presence is getting|closer, I'm able to come out. I mean, my life|is in danger, but...

12.「あんまり自覚なし？ ノンキなもんだよなー。| まっ その方がキミらしくて 面白: Not really aware of it? You're a nonchalant|one, aren't you? Well, that's more like you.|We have a chance to talk again like this.

13.「キミは覚えてる？ ボクの果たせなかった夢を。| それは アストルティア最大の役: Do you remember? My unfulfilled dream? It was|to win the World Performing Arts Grand Prix,|Astoltia's largest festival for actors!

14.「そのためにも ボクは| 伝説の『アクター極意書全５巻』を手に入れて| 実力を: To do so, I had to receive the legendary|"Actor's Creed" in five volumes and develop my|skills.

15.「そしたら あのピリッポが先に| 極意書を全巻集めて 読んじゃった！| 前とは: Then Pirippo went ahead and collected all the|books and read them! He's become so much|better than he was before.

18.「ボクはかつて ピリッポとコンビを組んでいた。| でも アイツは チャンピオンの: I used to work with Pirippo. But he was always|comparing himself to me, the champion.

19.「自分のいいところを 伸ばそうとしなかった。| だから コンビを解消したんだよ。: He didn't want to develop his strengths.|That's why I broke up the duo. I wanted him to|see Pirippo as he really is.

20.「ありがとよ。これからも オレは| ありのままに かむぜ！| ドリームズ かむ: Thanks a lot. I'm gonna keep biting just the|way I like it! Dreams, bite true!

21.「あっはっは！ ケッサク！| こんな天然モノ どこ探してもいないって。| それだ: Ha-ha-ha! Kessak! You can't find a natural|like him anywhere. That's it, Pirippo, your|secret!

22.「……ボクも そんな極意に| たどり着いてみたかった。| でも もう満足だ。: I wish I could have reached that kind of|mastery. But I'm satisfied now.

23.「ボクの夢は ボクも知らないうちに| ピリッポが継いでくれてたんだって| よーく: I now know that Pirippo has taken over my|dream without me even knowing it!

24.「ワールド演芸グランプリ優勝の夢は| どうやら アイツが 果たしてくれそうだ。|: It looks like he will be able to fulfill his|dream of winning the World Performing Grand|Prix. I'm sure one day....

25.「……ムフッ。| やっぱり 夢を語っちゃうとか| そういうのって ちょっと テレ: I'm sorry. I guess I'm a bit nervous when I|talk about my dreams.

26.「さーてと！ そろそろ ボクは行くよ。| 今度こそ 心残りはない！| 迷うことな: Well... I'd better get going. This time, no|regrets! I'm going that way without a second|thought.

27.「サラバだ <pc>！| キミの幸せを ずっと祈ってる。| 笑いと涙にあふれた: Saraba, <pc>! I'll be praying for|your happiness. I wish you a wonderful life|full of laughter and tears!

29.「今 キミの存在が こっちに近づいてるおかげで| こうして 出てくることができた: Your presence is now so close to me that I'm|able to come out like this. I mean, my life is|in danger, but...

30.「あんまり自覚なし？ ノンキなもんよねー。| まっ その方がキミらしくて 面白い: Not really aware of it? You're a very innocent|person, aren't you? Well, that's more like|you. We have a chance to talk again like this.

31.「覚えてる？ アタシの果たせなかった夢。| それは アストルティア最大の役者の祭: Do you remember? My unfulfilled dream. It was|to win the World Performing Arts Grand Prix,|Astoltia's largest festival for actors!

32.「そのためにも アタシは| 伝説の『アクター極意書全５巻』を手に入れて| 実力を: To do so, I had to receive the legendary|"Actor's Creed" in five volumes.

33.「そしたら あのピリッポが先に| 極意書を全巻集めて 読んじゃった！| 前とは: Then Pirippo went ahead and collected all the|books and read them! He's become so much|better than before.

34.「それを見ていて| アタシは…… アタシはね……！: And I was looking at it and I was... I was...!

36.「アタシは昔 ピリッポとコンビを組んでたの。| でも アイツは チャンピオンのア: I used to work with Pirippo. But he was always|comparing himself to me, the champion.

37.「自分のいいところを 伸ばそうとしなかった。| だから コンビを解消したのよ。|: He didn't want to develop his strengths.|That's why I broke it off. I wanted him to see|Pirippo as he really is.

38.「ありがとよ。これからも オレは| ありのままに かむぜ！| ドリームズ かむ: Thanks a lot. I'm gonna keep biting just the|way I like it! Dreams, bite true!

39.「あっはっは！ やだ ケッサク！| こんな天然モノ どこ探してもいないって。|: Ha-ha-ha! Oh, Kessak! You can't find a natural|like him anywhere. That's it, Pirippo, your|secret!

40.「……アタシも そんな極意に| たどり着いてみたかったな。| でもね もう満足し: I wish I could have reached that kind of|mastery. But you know what, I'm satisfied now.

41.「アタシの夢は アタシも知らないうちに| ピリッポが継いでくれてたんだって| よ: I knew that Pirippo had taken over my dream|without me even knowing it!

42.「ワールド演芸グランプリ優勝の夢は| どうやら アイツが 果たしてくれそうね。|: It looks like she's going to fulfill her dream|of winning the World Performing Arts Grand|Prix. I'm sure one day...

43.「……なーんて<heart>| キャー 言っちゃった！ 言っちゃった！| 夢とか: ...And so on<heart> Eek I said it! I|said it! I'm so embarrassed to talk about my|dreams!

44.「さーてと！ そろそろ アタシは行こっかな。| 今度こそ 心残りはないもんね！|: Well, well! I think it's time for me to go.|This time I won't have any regrets! I can go|that way without hesitation.

45.「じゃあねー もうひとりの <pc>。| キミの幸せを ずーっと祈ってるよ。|: Bye, the other <pc>. I'll be praying|for your happiness all the way. I wish you a|wonderful life full of laughter and tears!

46.「キミには ずいぶん 世話になっちゃったね。| これからは ボクのことは 気にせ: You have been a great help to me. From now on,|don't worry about me and go your own way.

47.「これは ボクからの ほんの気持ちだ。| いつか きっと 何かの役に立つはずだか: This is just a thought from me. I'm sure it|will be useful for something someday, so don't|forget to take it without Enryo.

49.「キミには ずいぶん お世話になっちゃった。| これからは アタシのことは 気に: You have been a great help to me. From now on,|don't worry about me and go your own way.

50.「これは アタシからの ほんの気持ち。| いつか きっと 何かの役に立つはずだか: This is just a small token from me. I'm sure|it will be useful for something someday, so|don't forget to keep it.
